name: Snake Acid
description:
is about reuniting the stars.
is controlled with mouse only.
might be visually intense for some.
will remain free until it won't.
will solve all your problems.
is 10 seconds long.
was made for Week 1 of the Game A Week programme.
Consider supporting my game-making on Patreon.

My personal best is 16. Pancelors best is 18.

The SourceCode is sold under Attribution-NonCommercial 4.0 International (CC BY-NC 4.0)

    • https://freemusicarchive.org/music/Komiku/The_Binge_Watchers__Score_1/Komiku_-_The_Binge_Watchers_-_Score_1_-_20_Action_Techno
